comments.raw_text:
Calendar should make use of the telemetry reporting recently added to Thunderbird. Some things I could imagine useful:


* Number of calendars used
* Number of events per calendar
* Percentage of recurring events to normal events
* Visibility of the today pane (per tab type), unifinder
comments.creator: philipp@bugzilla.kewis.ch
comments.author: philipp@bugzilla.kewis.ch
